# ui-textarea



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

`ui-textarea` is a component for rendering a textarea element.
It allows customization of the textarea's ID, name, value, and other attributes.

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                      | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Whether the textarea is disabled, preventing user interaction.                   | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `fieldId`     | `field-id`    | The ID of the textarea, used for form submission and accessibility.              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `maxlength`   | `maxlength`   | Maximum number of characters allowed in the textarea.                            | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `minlength`   | `minlength`   | Minimum number of characters required in the textarea.                           | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `name`        | `name`        | Additional properties for the textarea element.                                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Placeholder text displayed when the textarea is empty.                           | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `readOnly`    | `read-only`   | Whether the textarea is read-only, preventing user input but allowing selection. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `required`    | `required`    | Whether the textarea is required for form submission.                            | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `rows`        | `rows`        | Number of rows in the textarea, controlling its height.                          | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `value`       | `value`       | The value of the textarea, used for form submission.                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
